item.title: How to hack a Python app?
item.description:
Description

Thought hacking was hard? It’s not, it’s easy and I’m going to show you how! In this episode of CSI PyCon we’ll investigate a series of hacking stories and break them down step-by-step to see exactly how they did it. By the end you’ll walk away a little bit more scared but a lot more prepared.
item.dc:creator: Asim Hussain
